Name: Sacred Cubes
About the game: A logic game with many exciting levels of varying difficulty. Solve puzzles with different cubes and go to the end. Sacred Cubes has tons of unique blocks and levels, so complete them all! Features: - Various levels - Physics - Colorful graphics
